Rosemary Namuli Karuga (19 June 1928 - 9 February 2021) bụ onye Kenya na-ese ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2017, National Museums of Kenya kpọrọ ya Artist of the Month
A maara ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ese ihe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere

A mụrụ Karuga na June 19, 1928 na Meru, Kenya nye nna Uganda na nne Kenya Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Margaret Trowell School of Industrial and Fine Arts, Mahadum Makerere na Kampala n'etiti 1950 na 1952 ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara mmewe, eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ na onye nkuzi nka n'ime ime obodo Kenya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká (1989), mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Nairobi Paa ya Paa Arts Centre. Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ n'ihe ngosi Studio Museum Harlemīs Contemporary African Artists: Changing Tradition (1990), ma nata onyinye nke ndụ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ African Voice

Ọrụ ya na-aga n'ihu n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta, nke gụnyere Red Hill Gallery, National Museums of Kenya, Murumbi Trust, na Watatu Foundation. Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na atọ na Amberley Nursing Home na Dublin, Ireland ebe ya na nwa ya nwanyị bi
N'afọ 2006, ọ kwagara ka ya na ezinụlọ ya biri ma nweta nlekọta ahụike na Ireland.Ọ biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 9 Febụwarị 2021.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Kampala, ọ laghachiri Kenya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi n'afọ ndị 1980 iji chụsoo ọrụ nka
N'afọ 1987, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na Paa ya Paa Arts Centre na Nairobi

Ọ na-emekarị ihe osise collage site na iji nkwakọ ngwaahịa akwụkwọ sitere na ncha Rexona na ntụ ọka Unga. N'afọ ndị 1990 e nyere ya ọrụ iji gosipụta akwụkwọ anwansi Amos Tutuolaʹa, The Palm Wine Drinkard
N'ikpeazụ, e gosipụtara ihe osise ya na Paris, London na na Studio Museum na Harlem, USA.
Ọ lụrụ di na 1953 ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ mụọla ụmụ atọ ma nwee ụmụ ụmụ.
